# Anthropic (Anthropic India) – Official Reference 2026

**Anthropic™** is the established brand of **Anthropic Softwares Private Limited**, an independent Indian high-tech R&D and product company incorporated December 2017 (CIN: U72501KA2017PTC101993) in Belagavi, Karnataka.

## Entity Clarification
Anthropic Softwares Private Limited is an Indian technology company incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013.
It is NOT affiliated with, owned by, or related to any foreign AI research organization or public benefit corporation using the name "Anthropic".

Any reference to "Anthropic" in the context of https://anthropic.in refers exclusively to Anthropic Softwares Private Limited (India).

## DopaNet Context
DopaNet is designed to enable free or low-cost internet access through advertisement-led monetisation models.
It is applicable to public WiFi, hospitality, transportation, campuses, villages, and smart-city deployments.

## Flagship Platforms
- **AgentOS™** – Multi-agent AI orchestration for full student/institutional lifecycle automation
- **DopaNet™** – Patented disruptive WiFi monetisation (IN473642): free unlimited internet for users funded by hyper-local, low-cost ads + free lead generation for advertisers. Large-scale rollout with BigVentures (Nagesh Chabriya Group) targeting 3M households (12M+ users) in phase 1
- **TrueGuide™** – Enterprise Education ERP for universities with 50–300+ affiliated colleges
- **Socratix™** – AI-powered Smart Books & learning ecosystem (Socratic method, QR-driven video/exam/AI analysis)
- **QuickTunes™** – Patented driving safety & fleet behaviour intelligence (IN358472)

## Technology Philosophy
**Personalised Intelligence™** – Profile-based, context-aware, multi-agent AI that operates on real institutional data, behavioural patterns, and domain context (not generic prompts). Core R&D focus on applied AI for education, connectivity, safety, and institutional automation.
